NCBSinfo is an application for regular use, especially helpful for people working at the National Centre for Biological Science (NCBS), Bangalore. Our aim is to create a mobile application, which will serve as an application-cum-database for important information pertaining to NCBS. With the help of this, we will try to reduce the time spent on searching for shuttle timings and contact numbers.

This is NOT an official NCBS app and has been created ONLY for personal use. All the information provided in this application was last updated on December 30, 2016. Though a lot of effort has been taken to curate the information, minor discrepancies may still exist. Developers are not responsible for any such information presented/conveyed through this application. In case of any bug/error(s), please report it to the developers; measures will be taken to rectify the same.

• Some of components of the UI look weird

This application is not yet designed for all screen sizes. Hence UI components might appear distorted or misplaced.



• I am not being able to receive any event notifications

Please check if you have any task manager application that might be killing the NCBSinfo app. In that case, add this app to the white-list.



• There is no information in the event section

This can happen if there are no events retrieved from the server. The app will send request to data server depending on your network settings and will retrieve the data. If you want to manually sync the app, go to the developer\'s options and click on \"Sync Data now\".

Best part of an open source app is that you will know exactly what is going on inside the app. We encourage you to check our source code on GitHub ( https://github.com/NCBSinfo/NCBSinfo ). Code is heavily commented for readability. We collect various personal and general information from this app to make the user experience better. Following is the list of all information that we collect from users.



What information do we collect?

(from logged in users and why?)



• Name and email

(To authenticate you on our server)

• Default route

(To customize your app when you login again)

• Unique Token

(This token is generated by Firebase service through which you can get notifications from admins)

• Current NCBSinfo App version

(To remind you about new updates which will be free of bugs and issues)

• Last login

(To design network sync algorithms.)

• Transport Routes and Trips

(So that you don\'t have to make all of your routes again)





If you do not want any of above information to be send to our server, you can just use app without logging in.

WE DO NOT COLLECT ANY PERSONAL INFORMATION FROM THE USERS WHO HAVE NOT LOGGED IN.



NO ONE can check or see your password, not even developers. They are sent securely with https protocol and are stored in Google\'s cloud database with encryption.



Google and Firebase analytics

Alongside the above personal information, we also receive some anonymous statistics from all users who have installed this app. This information generally includes Android Version, Default language, Country, App version, Uninstall count etc.



Crash Report

This will send us anonymous crash reports (if any) which we use to fix bugs and make the app better :)
